entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a person who is amused by Horace's situation. He is mentioned as having a chin that is higher than Horace's head.

entities.name: horace
entities.description: Horace is described as a person who has been pretending to be an armchair and is un-abashed about it. He is also mentioned as having a shiny pate, prominent eyes, and a silver walrus-like moustache.
